name: Impossible (bonejon)
description:
I'm currently working on a game that is supposed to really piss you off. But I can beat it (remember I know everything about this game) so it doesn't really deserve the title "Impossible".

Game Mechanics:

Play the game and figure it out :)

CHEATS:

You can hop around each level by pressing the level's number. So pressing 1 will bring you to level 1, Pressing 2 will bring you to level 2 and so forth.

NEXT UPDATE:

Level 4-5
